mapper.sql: id, goods_id, spec_name, spec_price, is_delete, create_time, remark, cover_image, goods_repair, distribution, scale, disassembly, minimum_servicefee
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from goods_specification
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_specification (id, goods_id, spec_name, spec_price, is_delete, create_time, remark, cover_image, goods_repair, distribution, scale, disassembly, minimum_servicefee) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsRepair,jdbcType=REAL}, #{distribution,jdbcType=REAL}, #{scale,jdbcType=REAL}, #{disassembly,jdbcType=REAL}, #{minimumServicefee,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
